**What is this?**

**ellmer** is an R package that facilitates interaction with large
language models (LLMs) from various providers directly within R. It
supports multiple LLM providers, including OpenAI, Anthropic's Claude,
Google Gemini, and more. Key features of ellmer include streaming
outputs, tool/function calling, and structured data extraction,
enhancing the integration of LLM capabilities into R workflows.
